metadata.description: Multi-tentacled orchestration plugin for Claude Code

plugins.name: claude-octopus
plugins.description: v8.0.0 - Opus 4.6 model support, Agent Teams detection, auto memory guidance, skill description compression. Task metrics, debug mode, PDF page selection. Native Integration: TaskCreate/TaskUpdate, hybrid plan mode, state persistence. Project Lifecycle: .octo/ state management. 29 personas, 32 commands, 43 skills. Run /octo:setup.
